name: client-ledger-system-root
description: Client Ledger System - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix my-react-app" "npm run dev --prefix my-react-app/backend"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix my-react-app" "npm start --prefix my-react-app/backend"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd my-react-app && npm install && cd backend && npm install

author: Gayatri Lemon & Co.
